title: 269: Mike Johnson & Hot Confessions!
itunes:title: 269: Mike Johnson & Hot Confessions!
description:
Mike Johnson in in the house, Broads! Bekah and Jess chat with one of their Bach Nation fave of all time about everything under the sun - uber rides, Austin, pickle ball, his web series, tattoos, dental fears, who he thinks will be the next Bachelor, if he’ll go on BIP, Abigail, and more! Then we go over some of the #broadsquad’s sex confessions - penis size, sex in public, dirty talk, cheating and lots more!

MIKE JOHNSON:Check out his podcast “Talking it Out w/ Mike & Bryan”: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/talking-it-out/id1547358999Mike’s Insta: https://www.instagram.com/mike_johnson/Podcast Insta: https://www.instagram.com/talkingitoutbn/Find out more here: https://mikejohnsonsmile.com/

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:***RELIEFBAND: go to RELIEFBAND.COM and use promo code CHATTY to receive 20% off plus free shipping!***STAMPS.COM: go to STAMPS.COM and use promo code CHATTY for a special offer that includes a 4-week trial PLUS free postage and a digital scale!***HONEY: Get Honey for FREE at JOINHONEY.COM/CHATTY***TRUFF: Get 15% off site-wide plus FREE shipping with promo code CHATTY at TRUFF.COM***JUNESHINE: Get 20% off PLUS free shipping site-wide at JUNESHINE.COM/CHATTY or use code CHATTY

FOLLOW CHATTY BROADS:Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/chattybroads/Bekah: https://www.instagram.com/bekah/Jess: https://www.instagram.com/thebaddmom/Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCzx2N1qxFObhvSvf9tp7ayQ

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
